code: import axiosClient from"./axiosClient";export var category={movie:'movie',tv:'tv'};export var movieType={upComing:'upcoming',popular:'popular',topRated:'top_rated'};export var tvType={onTheAir:'on_the_air',popular:'popular',topRated:'top_rated'};var API_KEY='?api_key=3e92671fca168537fe01c0fad2e77b4d';var movieAPI={getMovieList:function getMovieList(type){var url="movie/".concat(movieType[type]).concat(API_KEY);return axiosClient.get(url);},getTvList:function getTvList(type,params){var url="tv/".concat(tvType[type]).concat(API_KEY);return axiosClient.get(url,params);},getOtherVideo:function getOtherVideo(type,id){var url="".concat(category[type],"/").concat(id,"/videos").concat(API_KEY);return axiosClient.get(url);},getDetail:function getDetail(cate,id){var url="".concat(category[cate],"/").concat(id).concat(API_KEY);return axiosClient.get(url);},getCredits:function getCredits(cate,id){var url="".concat(category[cate],"/").concat(id,"/credits").concat(API_KEY);return axiosClient.get(url);},getSimilarVideo:function getSimilarVideo(cate,id){var url="".concat(category[cate],"/").concat(id,"/similar").concat(API_KEY);return axiosClient.get(url);}};export default movieAPI;
